reviews.review: Игруха так себе, вообще не зацепила даже на 1 час

Нет гонки за скинами, нет званий, а значит и читеров нет. Смысл читерить если тебе за победу абсолютно ничего не дадут. Здесь только могут читерить иди-оты школьники. Тут более адекватные игроки Рекомендую.
7/10 I believe this is a cs go clone of sorts...
Counter-Strike Source is a classic. If your a fan of the counter strike series, you should try this out. Although, there is a few minor differences between it and CSGO; it is a good game.
Counter-Strike in a much simpler time.

This game was everything in my childhood, and is still a classic now with many players still in ALL game styles.

Let me try and break this down best I can to give you wonderful people of the Steam Community EVERY reason to buy this game:

First off, let's talk about the million-and-one game modes you can play. Normal, bhop, surf, zriot, ze, zm, hideandseek, mg, hoejus,, fy, gungame, scoutsknives, awpknives etc. - which were all community made including the maps, with NO EXTRA COST! Just head on into the server browser, and enjoy.

Next, let's talk about how the community is far from toxic. If we look at CSGO currently (whether it's casual or competitive, at whatever ranking stage) - there is always one who wants to be billy big b0ll0cks and talk smack to everyone else, or be loud, grief etc etc. In this, there are still... Wait for it...

DEDICATED SERVERS! Admins can mute, kill, kick and ban this minority, leaving you to get on with the fun.

If you're not one of these people who want to play the many different game modes offered in this, and still want good, olf-fashioned hostage or bomb Counter Strike, not to worry - it's still there! Only you don't have to pay monthly or sign up to a website to have the option to play 128 tick servers - that's the norm for this game *cough* 64tick CSGO *cough*

Overall, I have had MANY hours of entertainment (and still do), I've met many friends whom are now very close and even travelled to different countries to meet them, and I do, have, and always will recommend this Counter Strike to absolutely anybody. 

Thanks for reading! Happy gaming. :) :)

Assim como em todas os jogos da série Counter Strike, o seu objetivo principal como terrorista é plantar e explodir a bomba na base A ou B ou eliminar todos os contra-terroristas e o seu objetivo principal como contra-terrorista é defusar a bomba ou eliminar todos os terroristas.
O jogo também possui outros modos de jogo como resgate de reféns e os que a própria comunidade cria.

Pros:

- Mesmo o jogo sendo antigo, ainda possuem diversos servidores brasileiros.
- A quantidade de cheaters ( pelo o que eu vi ) é menor do que no CS:GO.
- É o Counter Strike mais otimizado da série e você pode ter certeza que ele roda em qualquer PC fraco, dependendo é claro da qualidade gráfica que você definir.
- Gráficos melhores que o CS 1.6 e extremamente divertido. Você não vai enjoar com facilidade.


Contras:

- Para sua data de lançamento o jogo está um pouco caro, porém ele fica de uns 12 reais na promoção.
- Não possui skins e nem itens no mercado da Steam.
- Não existem partidas competitivas valendo patente e nem nada do tipo.
- Física de balística e outros assim como em todos os CS's é uma porcaria.
- É possível varar em alguns locais que não deveria ser possível.
- Diversos bugs.

Дорогие разработчики Valve. Выражаю свою благодарность вам. Вы сделали игру покорила весь мир. Спасибо!
Почему стоит эту игру покупать:
1) Графон - он крут.
2) Куча крутых бесполезных вещей в покупке предметов, такие как очки ночного видения.
3) Звуки выстрелов - вам будет по кайфу их слушать.
4) Меткость - почувствуйте себя читером!
5) БЕСКОНЕЧНОЕ ГРАФФИТИ.
6) Нет скинов.
Не жалуюсь, покупайте.

I'm going through my entire library and putting a minimum of an hour into each game and then reviewing them, here is mine for Counter-Strike: Source:

This game should be called Counter-Strike: Dust2 since thats the only map I ever played on it.  Played this a lot with friends 100's of years ago before I had my own gaming pc.  We would go to the local gaming cafe thing and spend a day there getting our asses handed to us by the older kids.
Boa historia de explodir, desarmar, defender, resgatar, graficos altos bonitos, armas, mapas, multijogador cheio, Bots 20 vs 20, 7/10

1.还有说吗，游戏牛逼。
2.画风比1.6更精致，人物造型也更精致
3.游戏的可玩性超高，即使玩了多长时间，休息的时候仍然想玩几把。
4.游戏到后面玩腻了可以在网上下载新地图，不过新地图容易有游戏bug
5.游戏中有其他很多地图也很好玩
6.总之，游戏牛逼，值得购买
